author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ANDREA BECOMES THE FIRST TROPICAL STORM OF THE SEASON IN THE ATLANTIC...
summary: ...ANDREA BECOMES THE FIRST TROPICAL STORM OF THE SEASON IN THE ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 AM AST Tue Jun 24 the center of Andrea was located near 36.6, -48.9 with movement ENE at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1014 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ANDREA BECOMES THE FIRST TROPICAL STORM OF THE SEASON IN THE ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 AM AST Tue Jun 24 the center of Andrea was located near 36.6, -48.9 with movement ENE at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1014 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Andrea (AT1/AL012025)
